alert.note: Alert for Animas River Basin; Central Colorado River Basin; Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin; Four Corners, Upper Dolores River; Paradox Valley, Lower Dolores River; San Juan River Basin; Upper Gunnison River Valley (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 05 at 2:24PM MST until March 05 at 8:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * WHERE...In Colorado, Central Colorado River Basin, Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin, Upper Gunnison River Valley, Paradox Valley/Lower Dolores River, Four Corners/Upper Dolores River, Animas River Basin and San Juan River Basin. In Utah, Southeast Utah and Canyonlands/Natural Bridges. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. People, especially those with respiratory illnesses, heart disease, the elderly, and children are recommended to stay indoors and avoid prolonged outdoor exercise or heavy exertion due to wind-blown dust. &&

area.areaDesc: Animas River Basin; Central Colorado River Basin; Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin; Four Corners, Upper Dolores River; Paradox Valley, Lower Dolores River; San Juan River Basin; Upper Gunnison River Valley
